javadoc:
Generic interface for defining display options on data and dataTypes.  Uses
 Settings objects to store values which are interpreted by SettingsDefinition objects.

methods.name: concat
methods.comment:
Create a new list of SettingsDefinitions by concat'ing a base list with
 a var-arg'ish additional list of setting defs.

return.comment: new array with all the settings defs joined together.

methods.javadoc: Returns the name of this SettingsDefinition
methods.name: getName
methods.comment: Returns the name of this SettingsDefinition

methods.javadoc: Returns a description of this settings definition
methods.name: getDescription
methods.comment: Returns a description of this settings definition

methods.javadoc:
Removes any values in the given settings object assocated with this settings definition
@param settings the settings object to be cleared.
methods.name: clear
methods.comment: Removes any values in the given settings object assocated with this settings definition

params.name: settings
params.comment: the settings object to be cleared.

methods.name: copySetting
methods.comment:
Copies any setting value associated with this settings definition from the
 srcSettings settings to the destSettings.

name: SettingsDefinition
comment:
Generic interface for defining display options on data and dataTypes.  Uses
 Settings objects to store values which are interpreted by SettingsDefinition objects.
